name: Bresaola, Goat Cheese, Arugula And Truffle Oil On Focaccia
keywords: arugula, black truffle oil, bresaola, focaccia rolls, goat cheese
recipeIngredient: 2 ounces goat cheese, like Italian Caprini

recipeInstructions.text: Spread half focaccia with goat cheese. Top with bresaola, arugula and truffle oil. Cover with the other half. Serve immediately.
